alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 7:43AM EDT until June 12 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 830 AM EDT. * At 741 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Baconton, Doerun, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Flint, Red Store Crossroads, Livingston, Ticknor, Minnesota, Parkerville, Hawkinstown, Lester, Sigsbee, Pritchetts, Freeman, Poplar Arbor Church, Greenough and Elmodel Wma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
